item.description:
** I'll buy some chicken and beef for grilling **

 ** We could use other items, such as green salads, pasta salads, bread, appetizers, desserts and bottles of ZIN **

  Let's have some Zin and BBQ!

I'm also inviting the White Wine group (which is most of you!). And also the Wine Group II.

It will probably be a packed house, so please just members now. I'll put a limit at about 20 but that shouldn't be a problem.

Also, all the account money was used for meetup expenses so there will be a small cost for the BBQ meats.

And of course all food donations are welcome.

 

More details to follow.

Thanks,

Mike
item.name: Bring Zin and eat BBQ
